idea-plugin.name: IntelliJ plugin modul maven importer
idea-plugin.description: Imports maven modules as IntelliJ Idea plugin modules into IntelliJ

A plugin that helps to import maven project as IntelliJ module of 'PLUGIN_MODUL' type into IntelliJ IDEA.
Just add: <plugin> <groupId>de.plushnikov.maven.plugin</groupId> <artifactId>intellij-plugin-modul-importer-plugin</artifactId> <version>0.1</version> </plugin> to your maven project.
